scripts.build:frontend: npm run clear-dist && npm --prefix ./frontend run build
scripts.build:prod: npm run clear-modules && npm run install-fresh-modules && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:ci: NODE_ENV=production npm run clear-dist npm --prefix ./frontend run build -- --mode production
scripts.start:prod: npm run build:prod && NODE_ENV=production node index.js
